text:
In order to subclass DefaultLogger to take advantage of its message level 
filtering and capture its output for other uses (i.e. e-mailing), it is 
necessary to refactor so that the output can be captured by subclasses.

A patch will be attached.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
Created attachment 669
Facilitates subclass-ability with access to generated output.
A modified version has been committed for nightly build 2001-12-12.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
